table.style: border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top;

th.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; padding-top: 3px; padding-bottom: 3px

a.title: Details of how medication is/was taken or should be taken. This includes the number of units per intake and frequency of intake over a specified duration of time. Example: 1 tablet every 24h, for 10 days .

tr.td: Details of how medication is/was taken or should be taken

tr.style: border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px; vertical-align: top; background-color: #F7F7F7

td.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: #F7F7F7; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; white-space: nowrap; background-image: url(tbl_bck00.png)

a.title: Period when patient took, is taking or is expected to take the medication. This information may be expressed using start and end date times OR indicating the duration. The first is used to indicate a specified interval (e.g., from March 15th, 2017); the latter for indicating a 'floating' period (e.g., 2 weeks). In case of unbounded period (continuous therapy), the end element will be valued with an exceptional value.

description.value: Statement about a single medication as part of a medication summary.

short.value: Medication statement model

definition.value: Statement about a single medication as part of a medication summary.

short.value: Basic metadata for this information

definition.value: Basic metadata for this information

short.value: Patient/subject information

definition.value: Patient/subject information

short.value: Business identifier for the object, unique within its system. Supporting disambiguation between different contexts (systems/countries).

definition.value: Business identifier for the object, unique within its system. Supporting disambiguation between different contexts (systems/countries).

short.value: Author(s) responsible for the provided information.

definition.value: Author(s) responsible for the provided information. The exact role of the responsible author varies across use cases and is specific to individual models.

short.value: Date and optionally time of authoring/issuing

definition.value: Date and optionally time of authoring/issuing

short.value: Status of the resource or document

definition.value: Status of the resource or document

short.value: Source of information (e.g. patient, patient's proxy). Used in case the patient has authored the information or the author has submitted patient-stated information.

definition.value: Source of information (e.g. patient, patient's proxy). Used in case the patient has authored the information or the author has submitted patient-stated information.

short.value: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

definition.value: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

The first is used to indicate a specified interval (e.g., from March 15th, 2017); the latter for indicating a 'floating' period (e.g., 2 weeks). In case of unbounded period (continuous therapy), the end element will be valued with an exceptional value.
